title: Transforming the communication between citizens and government through AI-guided chatbots
research_description: This article proposes a novel AI-based chatbot system designed to improve communication between citizens and government agencies. The chatbot system integrates various AI technologies such as natural language processing and machine learning to support complex interactions between users and government agencies. The study explores different use cases in collaboration with Greek government agencies.
research_results: The study demonstrates that AI-guided chatbots significantly enhance the richness and expressiveness of government-citizen communication, leading to improved efficiency in public service delivery. The chatbot system was validated in various real-world scenarios with three Greek government agencies.
future_research: Future research should explore the scalability of AI-guided chatbots across different government sectors and investigate how they can handle more complex, multilingual interactions. Further evaluation of user satisfaction and AI ethics in public administration is also needed.
